name: Budew
flavorText:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.

previous.name: Luxray
previous.flavorText:
It has eyes that can see through
anything. It spots and captures
prey hiding behind objects.

next.name: Roserade
next.flavorText:
It attracts prey with a sweet
aroma, then downs it with
thorny whips hidden in its arms.

pokemon.name: Budew
pokemon.flavorText:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.

pokemon.name: Roselia
pokemon.flavorText:
ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as
projectiles at any opponent that tries
to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings
serenity to living things.

pokemon.name: Roserade
pokemon.flavorText:
It attracts prey with a sweet
aroma, then downs it with
thorny whips hidden in its arms.
